committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: To provide Congressional approval of the Governing International Fishery Agreement between the United States and the Government of the German Democratic Republic.

summary.text: Approves extension of a specified agreement between the United States and the German Democratic Republic as a governing international fishery agreement for the purposes of the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act, notwithstanding specified provisions of such Act relating to congressional oversight of international fishery agreements.

titles.title: To provide Congressional approval of the Governing International Fishery Agreement between the United States and the Government of the German Democratic Republic.
